title: Processing Data functions
text: data PIP process loaded package {pipload}. function pip_load_dlw() loads welfare data available DatalibWeb. use datalibweb Stata command reads directly flat folder provided Poverty GP. Function pip_load_aux() loads auxiliary data available PIP project. Auxiliary data refers dataset welfare data. important auxiliary data Price FrameWork (pfw) dataset, since data contains relevant metadata data processing estimations.

title: Processing Data functions
text: country price framework subset pfw data. Yet, simply filtered data. Sometimes may find two welfare types survey, necessary different sets information regarding welfare type. way, pfw must filtered using get_country_pfw() function.

title: Processing Data functions
text: functions prefixed pd_ Processing Data. used convert data datalibweb form pip form. results format data known input cache data. pd_ functions intended used high level, depend lower level S3 methods vary depending type welfare data.

code: ppp  <- pipload::pip_load_aux("ppp") #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpi  <- pipload::pip_load_aux("cpi") #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory pop  <- pipload::pip_load_aux("pop") #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory md   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw(country = "PRY", 2012) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory pfw  <- pipload::pip_load_aux("pfw") #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(md, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found md   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(md, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(md, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x    <- pd_dlw_clean(md, cpfw) y    <- pd_wbpip_clean(lf = x, cpfw = cpfw)[[1]]  add_pip_vars(df = y, cpfw = cpfw, cpi = cpi, ppp = ppp, pop = pop) #> Error in get(fnms[[i]]): object 'cpfw' not found  gd   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw("CHN", 2015) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(gd, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found gd   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x    <- pd_dlw_clean(gd, cpfw) y    <- pd_wbpip_clean(lf = x, cpfw = cpfw)[[1]]  add_pip_vars(df = y, cpfw = cpfw, cpi = cpi, ppp = ppp, pop = pop) #> Error in get(fnms[[i]]): object 'cpfw' not found  gd   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw("ARE", 2019) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(gd, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found gd   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x    <- pd_dlw_clean(gd, cpfw) y    <- pd_wbpip_clean(lf = x, cpfw = cpfw)[[1]]  add_pip_vars(df = y, cpfw = cpfw, cpi = cpi, ppp = ppp, pop = pop) #> Error in get(fnms[[i]]): object 'cpfw' not found

Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory x   <-  ppp_to_wide(ppp) #> Error in ppp_to_wide(ppp): object 'ppp' not found names(x) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x' not found

Prepare DatalibWeb inventory — update_dlw_inventory
text: takes dlw inventory csv form official folder structure format included pipeline. original csv file updated time dlw inventory updated

title: Prepare DatalibWeb inventory — update_dlw_inventory
code: update_dlw_inventory(   root_dir = Sys.getenv("PIP_ROOT_DIR"),   dlw_dir = pipfun::pip_create_globals(root_dir)$DLW_RAW_DIR,   force = FALSE )

title: Prepare DatalibWeb inventory — update_dlw_inventory
text: root_dir character: root directory PIP data dlw_dir character: path dlw raw data force logical: force update data

title: Prepare DatalibWeb inventory — update_dlw_inventory
text: logical. TRUE data changed. FALSE otherwise

code: md   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw(country = "PRY", 2012) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory pfw <- pipload::pip_load_aux("pfw") #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(md, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found md   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(md, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(md, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x <- pd_dlw_clean(md, cpfw) y <- wbpip_clean(x[[1]]) #> Error in UseMethod("wbpip_clean"): no applicable method for 'wbpip_clean' applied to an object of class "c('glue', 'character')" summary(y$weight) #> Error in summary(y$weight): object 'y' not found   gd   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw("CHN", 2015) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(gd, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found gd   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x    <- pd_dlw_clean(gd, cpfw) y    <- wbpip_clean(x[[1]]) #> Error in UseMethod("wbpip_clean"): no applicable method for 'wbpip_clean' applied to an object of class "c('glue', 'character')" y[, unique(area)] #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'y' not found  gd   <- pipload::pip_load_dlw("ARE", 2019) #> ! root_dir is not defined. Directory paths will lack network-drive root #> directory #> Error: [ENOENT] Failed to search directory '/pip_ingestion_pipeline/pc_data/cache/clean_survey_data': no such file or directory cpfw <- get_country_pfw(gd, pfw) #> Error in uniqueN(pfw, by = keyVar): object 'pfw' not found gd   <- pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw) #> Error in pd_split_alt_welfare(gd, cpfw): object 'cpfw' not found x <- pd_dlw_clean(gd, cpfw) y <- wbpip_clean(x[[1]]) #> Error in UseMethod("wbpip_clean"): no applicable method for 'wbpip_clean' applied to an object of class "c('glue', 'character')" y[, unique(area)] #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'y' not found
